LABEL: 0x2C4
STRING: The footsteps suddenly stopped.

LABEL: 0x2E8
STRING: On the other side of the door...

LABEL: 0x308
STRING: ...Only the sound of the sprinklers could be heard.

LABEL: 0x388
STRING: Silence...

LABEL: 0x39E
STRING: Yukari and I stopped moving.

LABEL: 0x3C4
STRING: My heart was beating faster.

LABEL: 0x3DE
STRING: Time flowed slowly.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: I tried to hide my presence as much as possible.

LABEL: 0x42C
STRING: Yukari's hand covering my mouth was sweating profusely.

LABEL: 0x462
STRING: When I turned to look at her, she was shaking for some reason.

LABEL: 0x49C
STRING: Upon closer inspection, her entire face was red and trembling.

LABEL: 0x4F4
STRING: ...Was she holding her breath?

LABEL: 0x522
STRING: She puffed out her cheeks in pain and turned red as if she was finally nearing her limit.

LABEL: 0x576
STRING: Someone was waiting for us on the other side of that door.

LABEL: 0x5A4
STRING: Under the rain of the sprinklers.

LABEL: 0x5CA
STRING: In a hallway filled with soporific smoke.

LABEL: 0x5E8
STRING: The room was dead quiet.

LABEL: 0x602
STRING: Yukari's limbs were trembling slightly.

LABEL: 0x64A
STRING: This wasn't good.

LABEL: 0x660
STRING: Despite this desperate situation, for some reason, I felt relaxed.

LABEL: 0x6AC
STRING: ...I'll just assume it was because I'd noticed how Yukari was seemingly putting her life on the line.

LABEL: 0x747
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x761
STRING: Even if we hid our presence like this, if they entered the room, it was all over.

LABEL: 0x7BF
STRING: Could they even tell what was on the other side of the door over the sound of the sprinklers in the first place?

LABEL: 0x81F
STRING: If they were looking inside every room, then us concealing our presence like this didn't matter at all.

LABEL: 0x87B
STRING: We had to find a place to hide――

LABEL: 0x947
STRING: I heard the sound of the door unlocking.

LABEL: 0x965
STRING: ――Shit.

LABEL: 0x97F
STRING: We didn't make it in time.

LABEL: 0x99F
STRING: I had no choice but to steel myself.

LABEL: 0x9C3
STRING: Yukari's trembling body froze as well.

LABEL: 0xAB1
STRING: You could cut the air with a knife...

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: If they came in, what then?

LABEL: 0xAF7
STRING: If they were the one who spread the smoke, there was a good chance we'd be harmed as soon as we were found.

LABEL: 0xB51
STRING: In that case, we should make the first move...

LABEL: 0xB83
STRING: I wondered if they had a weapon.

LABEL: 0xBAF
STRING: There was nothing in the room that could be used as a weapon.

LABEL: 0xBE3
STRING: Or rather, if we were attacked with soporific smoke, there was nothing we could do.

LABEL: 0xC21
STRING: The moment we breathed in, we'd be done for.

LABEL: 0xC4D
STRING: Yukari, who was steeling her body, seemed to have made up her mind.

LABEL: 0xC7F
STRING: We stared at the door and waited for them to move.

LABEL: 0xCB3
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xCE8
STRING: The footsteps slowly faded into the distance.

LABEL: 0xD04
STRING: I could hear them leave, splashing the water on the floor as they went.

LABEL: 0xDCB
STRING: ...Were they gone?

LABEL: 0xDEB
STRING: Or was this a trap?

LABEL: 0xE64
STRING: Yukari and I glanced at each other.

LABEL: 0xE84
STRING: She looked bewildered like she couldn't judge it, either.

LABEL: 0xEBE
STRING: We stayed like that for a moment, but...

LABEL: 0xEE8
STRING: 「Looks like they've gone somewhere...」

LABEL: 0xF82
STRING: 「Haah... Haah...」

LABEL: 0xFBE
STRING: 「Haah... What... was that all about?」

LABEL: 0xFFF
STRING: She calmed herself down with deep breaths.

LABEL: 0x102B
STRING: I let go of her body, which had been pressed up against mine for a while now, and exhaled deeply.

LABEL: 0x1069
STRING: So, she was holding her breath all this time...

LABEL: 0x1099
STRING: Her lung capacity was actually worthy of respect, but why was she doing it in the first place?

LABEL: 0x10EB
STRING: Holding your breath to hide your presence was something grade schoolers thought of, wasn't it...?

LABEL: 0x119F
STRING: 「Phew.」

LABEL: 0x1212
STRING: 「Looks like we managed to dodge them.」

LABEL: 0x1241
STRING: Yukari displayed an expression of accomplishment.

LABEL: 0x1263
STRING: Our situation hadn't improved yet.

LABEL: 0x1291
STRING: The problem was just pigeonholed again.

LABEL: 0x12BB
STRING: 「Now's our chance to see what's going on out there.」

LABEL: 0x12ED
STRING: 「We don't know when they'll be back, so we should hurry.」

LABEL: 0x139F
STRING: 「Please wait.」

LABEL: 0x13BF
STRING: 「The smoke is still there, you know?」

LABEL: 0x144E
STRING: 「If you go out now, you'll just collapse again.」

LABEL: 0x1492
STRING: 「Not only that but there's also the possibility of smoke entering this room.」

LABEL: 0x14E3
STRING: 「That's true, but...」

LABEL: 0x1507
STRING: 「I can't just sit here and do nothing.」

LABEL: 0x15B3
STRING: 「In other words...」

LABEL: 0x15CF
STRING: 「We just need to find out what's going on outside of this room, right?」

LABEL: 0x1617
STRING: 「POL!」

LABEL: 0x1633
STRING: Yukari spoke to the wristband on her hand.

LABEL: 0x1665
STRING: 【Yes?】

LABEL: 0x167B
STRING: A voice answered.

LABEL: 0x169F
STRING: Its pronunciation was fluent, but I didn't have high hopes for POL considering how worthless it had been so far...

LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: 「POL! On the second floor of the rear...」

LABEL: 0x1733
STRING: 「The second floor...?」

LABEL: 0x175A
STRING: 「...Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x17E4
STRING: 「...What am I supposed to ask exactly?」

LABEL: 0x181D
STRING: Hey.

LABEL: 0x1831
STRING: Never mind POL, our human operator here was quite a ditz herself.

LABEL: 0x1886
STRING: I raised my voice in place of Yukari, who looked troubled.

LABEL: 0x18BA
STRING: 「Let's see...」

LABEL: 0x18E2
STRING: 「POL! What's the status of the soporific smoke?」

LABEL: 0x1913
STRING: 【I'm sorry. I don't understand your question.】

LABEL: 0x194F
STRING: No good.

LABEL: 0x1965
STRING: 「Is it safe outside this room?」

LABEL: 0x1985
STRING: 【There is a possibility of a fire.】

LABEL: 0x19AB
STRING: 「...What's the oxygen level in the hallway?」

LABEL: 0x19D3
STRING: 【Oxygen levels on the entire second floor are 20.2%% on average.】

LABEL: 0x1A2A
STRING: ...Hmm?

LABEL: 0x1A46
STRING: How would I get the answer I wanted?

LABEL: 0x1A78
STRING: Actually, you should know the situation, POL.

LABEL: 0x1AA2
STRING: Please understand my intentions.

LABEL: 0x1ACC
STRING: ...No matter how fluent, it wasn't very smart, was it...?

LABEL: 0x1B1E
STRING: 「I'm sorry, but... POL is useless.」

LABEL: 0x1BB9
STRING: 「Sorry... It was no good, huh?」

LABEL: 0x1BF7
STRING: Yukari hung her head.

LABEL: 0x1C11
STRING: POL was excellent as a guide for a cruise submarine,

LABEL: 0x1C4C
STRING: and I was sure it'd been programmed to deal with danger in its own way.

LABEL: 0x1C98
STRING: Still, I guess it couldn't really deal with an emergency like this.

LABEL: 0x1CEE
STRING: If only I knew what was going on with the smoke in the hallway, I could do something...

LABEL: 0x1D42
STRING: 「...How long will the smoke last?」

LABEL: 0x1D87
STRING: 「I'm not sure... There are probably several different types.」

LABEL: 0x1DDB
STRING: 「I don't know how strong it is, how fast it works, how long it lasts, none of it.」

LABEL: 0x1E3E
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x1ECC
STRING: 「That said, soporific smoke is absorbed into your body through breathing.」

LABEL: 0x1F1C
STRING: 「Naturally, it should be water-soluble.」

LABEL: 0x1F47
STRING: 「Which means, as long as the sprinklers are there...」

LABEL: 0x1F8A
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x1FA0
STRING: 「As I said before, I believe the sprinklers will be able to get rid of most of the smoke.」

LABEL: 0x1FFD
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0x202C
STRING: 「But, we have no proof.」

LABEL: 0x2075
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x2093
STRING: But while we were here talking like this, the person from before might come back.

LABEL: 0x20D5
STRING: At the very least, if I could go outside for just a moment...

LABEL: 0x2155
STRING: Time flowed aimlessly.

LABEL: 0x2175
STRING: Yukari was tapping her foot against the floor.

LABEL: 0x21A3
STRING: The irregular rhythm must've been a sign of her frustration.

LABEL: 0x21E3
STRING: ...And.

LABEL: 0x2200
STRING: The sound of the rain outside weakened until it finally ceased.

LABEL: 0x222E
STRING: Had the sprinklers stopped?

LABEL: 0x2258
STRING: In other words, the firefighting operation was over.

LABEL: 0x229A
STRING: Which meant that the smoke level outside had decreased enough.

LABEL: 0x22F2
STRING: 「Isn't it okay to go outside now?」

LABEL: 0x2398
STRING: 「You might be right...」

LABEL: 0x2415
STRING: 「However, we can't say for sure.」

LABEL: 0x24A2
STRING: 「What's certain is that the concentration of smoke has reached a level where the fire detector can't detect it.」

LABEL: 0x2561
STRING: 「But I don't know if that level is safe for the human body.」

LABEL: 0x259D
STRING: 「We can't be sure of how it'll affect us.」

LABEL: 0x25E8
STRING: Yukari was being cautious.

LABEL: 0x2608
STRING: I felt like she was being overly careful, but what she said was right.

LABEL: 0x2656
STRING: But, now that the sprinklers were off, there were no other indicators of safety.

LABEL: 0x26B4
STRING: We needed more information...

LABEL: 0x2704
STRING: 「How does the <SHEEP III> fire alarm work in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x27C5
STRING: 「I don't know that much――」

LABEL: 0x284E
STRING: 「――Wait.」

LABEL: 0x28C5
STRING: 「...POL should know.」

LABEL: 0x28FB
STRING: 「POL, again...?」

LABEL: 0x2916
STRING: I just couldn't get excited because of its previous failures.

LABEL: 0x29D2
STRING: 「It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x29EE
STRING: 「When it comes to the capabilities of the <SHEEP III> and the data surrounding it, POL should know more than anyone.」

LABEL: 0x2A49
STRING: 「Believe in POL, please...」

LABEL: 0x2A77
STRING: I wondered if the reason she sounded so desperate was to protect the prestige of ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x2ACB
STRING: Since the accident, POL'd had little opportunity to play an active role,

LABEL: 0x2B23
STRING: being down at critical times or just otherwise useless.

LABEL: 0x2B56
STRING: ...I guess it was about time for it to clear its name.

LABEL: 0x2BA4
STRING: Well, not that I was expecting much from it...

LABEL: 0x2BD4
STRING: 「POL!」

LABEL: 0x2BEB
STRING: 「Tell me about the fire alarm system set up in the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x2C34
STRING: 【The fire detectors installed on the ship are photoelectric spot-type smoke detectors and thermostatic spot-type detectors.】

LABEL: 0x2C9A
STRING: 【The former detects when the light source in the detector is diffusely reflected by smoke particles.】

LABEL: 0x2CE8
STRING: 【The latter detects and reacts to temperatures above a certain level.】

LABEL: 0x2D20
STRING: Which meant...

LABEL: 0x2D38
STRING: If there were any smoke particles left, and the light was reflected diffusely by them,

LABEL: 0x2D7E
STRING: the system would determine that a fire was present, and the sprinklers would activate.

LABEL: 0x2DCF
STRING: If that was the case, and since the sprinklers turned off, there shouldn't be any smoke left out there.

LABEL: 0x2E29
STRING: All the soporific smoke had been washed away...  Was it too soon to say that?

LABEL: 0x2E77
STRING: Even if not, the concentration must have dropped significantly.

LABEL: 0x2ECD
STRING: All right.

LABEL: 0x2F3E
STRING: 「Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x2F56
STRING: 「I think I'll go outside after all.」

LABEL: 0x3017
STRING: 「It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x302F
STRING: She sounded worried, but I stopped her.

LABEL: 0x3063
STRING: I removed the nearest pillowcase and filled it with air from the room.

LABEL: 0x30AD
STRING: It swelled up like a balloon.

LABEL: 0x30D7
STRING: I'd heard this tidbit that if you breathed air from a plastic bag in a scene of a fire, it would last you around ten minutes.

LABEL: 0x3141
STRING: 「If there's any smoke left and I get dizzy, I'll use this as an oxygen tank.」

LABEL: 0x31A4
STRING: 「That's just...」

LABEL: 0x31CB
STRING: 「Now that the sprinklers have stopped,

LABEL: 0x31F9
STRING: there's no way to tell how long it'll take for the smoke concentration to drop any further.」

LABEL: 0x3285
STRING: Yukari tried to continue her protest but couldn't say anything in the end.

LABEL: 0x32C1
STRING: 「Now's the time.」

LABEL: 0x32DB
STRING: 「The right timing.」

LABEL: 0x338B
STRING: 「...Haah.」

LABEL: 0x33AA
STRING: We stared at each other for a moment until she sighed.

LABEL: 0x3446
STRING: 「...I'm sure you wouldn't listen even if I tried to stop you.」

LABEL: 0x3483
STRING: 「Then――」

LABEL: 0x34AE
STRING: 「But I have one condition.」

LABEL: 0x34DF
STRING: 「Condition?」

LABEL: 0x3506
STRING: 「Yes.」

LABEL: 0x351C
STRING: 「I'm going with you.」

LABEL: 0x3542
STRING: 「――If you run into the rescue team, it'll be better if I'm there to talk to them.」

LABEL: 0x35A3
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x362D
STRING: 「Now that that's decided, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x365B
STRING: 「Let's hurry.」

LABEL: 0x3698
STRING: Yukari grabbed a nearby pillowcase and filled it with air as well.

LABEL: 0x36DE
STRING: Our eyes met.

LABEL: 0x3781
STRING: Silently, she nodded.

LABEL: 0x37A1
STRING: I guess that meant she was ready.

LABEL: 0x3842
STRING: I put my hand on the door,

LABEL: 0x3864
STRING: and slowly,

LABEL: 0x387E
STRING: ――opened it.

LABEL: 0x3913
STRING: I leaned out and peeked into the hallway.

LABEL: 0x3943
STRING: ...There was no one there.

LABEL: 0x3963
STRING: I couldn't see anything abnormal at first glance.

LABEL: 0x3995
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x39AD
STRING: Timidly, I took a breath――

LABEL: 0x3A8F
STRING: ――Instantly.

LABEL: 0x3AA7
STRING: My consciousness faded for a moment.

LABEL: 0x3AC9
STRING: There was a numbing aroma.

LABEL: 0x3AE9
STRING: I lost my footing.

LABEL: 0x3B07
STRING: I leaned on to the wall for support.

LABEL: 0x3B2F
STRING: My vision suddenly darkened, but I managed to hold out.

LABEL: 0x3B80
STRING: 「Are you okay?!」

LABEL: 0x3BA7
STRING: A voice called out to me from behind.

LABEL: 0x3BC7
STRING: Her unusually worried tone almost made me laugh inappropriately.

LABEL: 0x3C0B
STRING: Was she always this worried about me?

LABEL: 0x3C61
STRING: 「Y-Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x3C7F
STRING: 「Just a little dizzy, but I think I'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x3CB7
STRING: 「As long as I don't inhale too much...」

LABEL: 0x3CEB
STRING: I covered my mouth with the pillowcase in my right hand.

LABEL: 0x3D21
STRING: It made it a little easier to breathe.

LABEL: 0x3D47
STRING: There was still some smoke left, but it looked like it would work out somehow.

LABEL: 0x3D7D
STRING: 「As long as I have this, I'll be fine...」

LABEL: 0x3DB1
STRING: 「Let's go!」

LABEL: 0x3DCB
STRING: I stepped outside through the door.

LABEL: 0x3E0B
STRING: Something felt off at my feet.

LABEL: 0x3E31
STRING: When I looked, I saw clear water――

LABEL: 0x3EF8
STRING: For a moment, everything went dark.

LABEL: 0x3F1E
STRING: Seeing the flooded hallway automatically reminded me of the rear section.

LABEL: 0x3F5E
STRING: Shaking my head vigorously, I banished the bad memories.

LABEL: 0x4067
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x4088
STRING: 「I'm fine.」

LABEL: 0x40A4
STRING: Deep breaths...

LABEL: 0x40BC
STRING: ...Okay, no problem.

LABEL: 0x40DE
STRING: That was probably just the water from the sprinklers, but was the drainage system not working?

LABEL: 0x4152
STRING: While I was thinking that, water seeped into my shoes.

LABEL: 0x4194
STRING: I was enveloped in a damp, unpleasant sensation, but I had no time to worry about that.

LABEL: 0x4200
STRING: 「This...」

LABEL: 0x4229
STRING: 「Looks like there's nothing we can do about it.」

LABEL: 0x425A
STRING: I heard the sound of our footsteps every time we took a step.

LABEL: 0x427C
STRING: At this rate, we'd be found out in no time.

LABEL: 0x42B4
STRING: We had already given up on hiding and were out in the open now...

LABEL: 0x42E8
STRING: ...Not like we had the means to oppose them, but it was a matter of feeling.

LABEL: 0x43A5
STRING: Now then...

LABEL: 0x43BB
STRING: What should we do?

LABEL: 0x43D7
STRING: There were two main options.

LABEL: 0x43FD
STRING: Should we go back to the room where Reiri and Touri were, or should we go to Hiragino and Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x4441
STRING: I thought back to the twins from earlier.

LABEL: 0x44E6
STRING: The two had already been put to sleep by someone.

LABEL: 0x451C
STRING: We had left them in their room, but I wondered if they were okay.

LABEL: 0x455E
STRING: It bothered me, but...

LABEL: 0x4588
STRING: If someone wanted to hurt them,

LABEL: 0x45C4
STRING: they would've done so already instead of leaving them lying there unattended.

LABEL: 0x4622
STRING: Considering they hadn't done that, shouldn't those two still be safe?

LABEL: 0x46E4
STRING: 「What do you think, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x4774
STRING: 「Well, let's see...」

LABEL: 0x4794
STRING: 「I'm not sure about their intent to harm the twins any further after putting them to sleep.」

LABEL: 0x47F0
STRING: 「If we have the spare time to go check up on Reiri-san and Touri-san,

LABEL: 0x488F
STRING: shouldn't we go tell Hiragino-sensei and Tokiwa-san about the situation as soon as possible instead?」

LABEL: 0x48E4
STRING: I completely agreed with her.

LABEL: 0x4910
STRING: The two of them were supposed to be on the third floor.

LABEL: 0x4932
STRING: I couldn't help but wonder what Hiragino and Tokiwa were doing right now.

LABEL: 0x4996
STRING: I directed my gaze automatically upward toward the third floor.

LABEL: 0x49BE
STRING: For a while now, I hadn't heard any footsteps other than ours.

LABEL: 0x49F6
STRING: The floor itself was fairly spacious, so there was no telling for sure.

LABEL: 0x4A44
STRING: It was highly likely that the owner of the footsteps that had walked off earlier was no longer on this floor.

LABEL: 0x4A8E
STRING: If they went to the spiral staircase, it was natural to assume that they'd gone up.

LABEL: 0x4AEC
STRING: 「Okay, let's go to the third floor.」

LABEL: 0x4B12
STRING: 「To the emergency room where those two are.」

LABEL: 0x4C1B
STRING: We immediately headed to the third floor.

LABEL: 0x4C3B
STRING: With all the water, I was worried that the automatic bulkhead might have activated, but my fears were unfounded.

LABEL: 0x4CA7
STRING: Come to think of it, when Reiri had been strangled, the sprinklers were activated as well, but the bulkhead hadn't closed.

LABEL: 0x4D11
STRING: That said, it wasn't as flooded back then as it was now...

LABEL: 0x4D57
STRING: Was it set up to not react to the sprinklers?

LABEL: 0x4D9B
STRING: Or was there something wrong with the system?

LABEL: 0x4DD5
STRING: In any case, even if the front section was divided here, there was nothing we could do about it.

LABEL: 0x4E2F
STRING: That would have been dangerous...

LABEL: 0x4E55
STRING: I climbed the stairs and listened closely.

LABEL: 0x4EF8
STRING: ――Silence.

LABEL: 0x4F10
STRING: There was no one there...

LABEL: 0x4F2E
STRING: ...Or was there?

LABEL: 0x4F46
STRING: At the very least, I couldn't hear anything at all.

LABEL: 0x4F70
STRING: The sprinklers seemed to have been activated on the third floor as well, as the floor was thoroughly wet.

LABEL: 0x4FBE
STRING: If someone moved somewhere, the sound should be enough to convey their presence, but...

LABEL: 0x5002
STRING: 「That's weird...」

LABEL: 0x508E
STRING: 「You're right... I'm worried.」

LABEL: 0x50B6
STRING: 「Let's head there quickly.」

LABEL: 0x5101
STRING: Yukari dashed toward the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x512D
STRING: How did she keep her balance on this wet and unstable floor so well?

LABEL: 0x5173
STRING: Not to be outdone, I chased after her.

LABEL: 0x51AA
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei!」

LABEL: 0x51CB
STRING: The emergency room.

LABEL: 0x51E1
STRING: We arrived in front of the door.

LABEL: 0x5201
STRING: The walls were too thick for me to hear anything.

LABEL: 0x522B
STRING: I couldn't tell if there was anyone inside.

LABEL: 0x525D
STRING: Hiragino...

LABEL: 0x5273
STRING: Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x528B
STRING: It had already been more than thirty minutes since we parted ways.

LABEL: 0x52C3
STRING: Anything could have happened in that time.

LABEL: 0x52FB
STRING: I couldn't be sure if the two of them were safe at all.

LABEL: 0x539F
STRING: 「Sensei! Can you hear me?!」

LABEL: 0x53CE
STRING: Yukari repeated herself in front of the door.

LABEL: 0x53F0
STRING: Was she upset because there was no response?

LABEL: 0x5428
STRING: 「Yukari-san, calm down.」

LABEL: 0x5450
STRING: 「Let's open the door.」

LABEL: 0x5557
STRING: 「O-Of course.」

LABEL: 0x5598
STRING: Without waiting for me to pull my keycard out of my pocket, she pulled out her master key.

LABEL: 0x55F8
STRING: She held it up to the door.

LABEL: 0x5645
STRING: The door opened with a light sound.

LABEL: 0x566D
STRING: And when it did――

LABEL: 0x5734
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei!」

LABEL: 0x5755
STRING: On the floor of the emergency room...

LABEL: 0x576F
STRING: ...Was his large back, lying face down.

LABEL: 0x5799
STRING: His white coat.

LABEL: 0x57AD
STRING: Yukari shook him to wake him up.

LABEL: 0x5841
STRING: 「Sensei! Sensei!」

LABEL: 0x5866
STRING: 「Hiragino-san!」

LABEL: 0x5986
STRING: 「Sensei!」

LABEL: 0x59A8
STRING: He looked dizzy, but he was still conscious.

LABEL: 0x59D6
STRING: Yukari let out a cry of joy as Hiragino opened his eyes.

LABEL: 0x5A26
STRING: 「Are you okay?!」

LABEL: 0x5A70
STRING: He only grunted in pain as if he had no idea what was going on.

LABEL: 0x5AAC
STRING: However, when Yukari called out to him, he managed to produce some sort of reply.

LABEL: 0x5AE8
STRING: I guess that was a relief for now.

LABEL: 0x5B0C
STRING: ――I was so engrossed in waking Hiragino up that I realized I'd taken the bag out of my mouth.

LABEL: 0x5B6A
STRING: Yukari had as well, and even after taking as many deep breaths as she had, there was no sign of anything wrong with her body.

LABEL: 0x5BC8
STRING: It didn't smell as strong as before.

LABEL: 0x5BF4
STRING: The emergency room didn't seem to be particularly contaminated.

LABEL: 0x5C2A
STRING: Yukari sat Hiragino up while holding him from behind.

LABEL: 0x5C68
STRING: I took another look around the room.

LABEL: 0x5C98
STRING: As far as I could tell, there was nothing out of the ordinary.

LABEL: 0x5CCA
STRING: The room was tidy, and there was no sign of a scuffle.

LABEL: 0x5D12
STRING: If anything, it was dirtier yesterday when Tokiwa was messing around with Hiragino's desk――

LABEL: 0x5D74
STRING: ...By the way, where was Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x5D9C
STRING: The girl in the dazzlingly colored kimono was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x5DDE
STRING: The fact that I couldn't sense her overwhelming presence anywhere made me... uneasy.

LABEL: 0x5E3A
STRING: 「Wake up, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x5E60
STRING: 「Where the hell did Tokiwa go?」

LABEL: 0x5EB7
STRING: 「Drugs...」

LABEL: 0x5ED4
STRING: ――Drugs?

LABEL: 0x5EEA
STRING: Hiragino said so, deliriously.

LABEL: 0x5F14
STRING: Speaking of drugs...

LABEL: 0x5F30
STRING: I rummaged through the pockets of the doctor's coat he was wearing.

LABEL: 0x5F68
STRING: I found a small ampule in the chest pocket.

LABEL: 0x5F92
STRING: It was Reiri's medicine he had recovered yesterday.

LABEL: 0x5FBA
STRING: A medicine she was said to take all the time, and which Hiragino, a doctor, knew nothing about.

LABEL: 0x6016
STRING: We still didn't know anything about it.

LABEL: 0x60AE
STRING: 「Drugs...」

LABEL: 0x60C6
STRING: 「I was drugged...」

LABEL: 0x60ED
STRING: The soporific smoke, huh?

LABEL: 0x6107
STRING: Looked like he was put to sleep the same way I was.

LABEL: 0x6155
STRING: Still, I guess I should say I was lucky that I woke up so quickly.

LABEL: 0x6195
STRING: Maybe I hadn't inhaled much of the smoke at all.

LABEL: 0x623B
STRING: 「I let my guard down... Me of all people...」

LABEL: 0x6270
STRING: Hiragino regained his bearings in the meantime.

LABEL: 0x62C5
STRING: 「What... time is it now?」

LABEL: 0x62EC
STRING: 「It's past eight o'clock, looks like.」

LABEL: 0x6316
STRING: I glanced at the clock on the wall and answered.

LABEL: 0x6349
STRING: 「――Where's Tokiwa-kun?」

LABEL: 0x6378
STRING: 「We didn't see her anywhere.」

LABEL: 0x640E
STRING: 「――What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x6435
STRING: Hiragino tried to get up in surprise.

LABEL: 0x6483
STRING: However, he still couldn't put any strength into his body and leaned against Yukari.

LABEL: 0x6596
STRING: 「So Tokiwa-kun is...」

LABEL: 0x65BD
STRING: 「...What in the hell happened?」

LABEL: 0x65F4
STRING: 「Right...」

LABEL: 0x660E
STRING: 「It was less than five minutes after you left.」

LABEL: 0x663F
STRING: 「While I was investigating the rescue ship, leaving Tokiwa-kun behind in the room, I heard a sound from outside.」

LABEL: 0x6693
STRING: 「Surprised, I exited the ship only to be greeted by a strong smell.」

LABEL: 0x66CF
STRING: 「I lost consciousness instantly.」

LABEL: 0x66FD
STRING: 「All the way until now... I'm ashamed of myself.」

LABEL: 0x672E
STRING: With that, he bowed his head.

LABEL: 0x6754
STRING: His face contorted in frustration.

LABEL: 0x6778
STRING: 「Did you see anyone when you were put to sleep?」

LABEL: 0x6818
STRING: 「No... No one.」

LABEL: 0x6836
STRING: 「I think some sort of sleeping agent was sprayed into the room from the outside.」

LABEL: 0x687A
STRING: 「That's why I saw no one at all, let alone anyone's face.」

LABEL: 0x68BA
STRING: 「To make matters worse, there was no one inside the rescue ship, either.」

LABEL: 0x68F8
STRING: 「I'm not sure what that means, but...」

LABEL: 0x693D
STRING: They weren't inside the rescue ship, and they hadn't shown themselves inside the <SHEEP III> either.

LABEL: 0x6982
STRING: Where the hell was the rescue team, and what were they doing?

LABEL: 0x69BE
STRING: What the hell was ROMLES thinking?

LABEL: 0x6A24
STRING: The more I thought about it, the less I understood.

LABEL: 0x6A4E
STRING: I only had baseless hunches I could work with.

LABEL: 0x6A80
STRING: 「Shit!」

LABEL: 0x6A98
STRING: No good.

LABEL: 0x6AAE
STRING: There was no point in thinking about it.

LABEL: 0x6ACE
STRING: There was something more important we had to do first.

LABEL: 0x6B0C
STRING: 「Anyway, we need to find Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x6B3C
STRING: 「How are you feeling, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x6BCC
STRING: 「Oh, I'm fine...

LABEL: 0x6C77
STRING: 「I'm sorry, I guess my head's still...」

LABEL: 0x6CA6
STRING: He was awake now, but it looked like he was pushing his body still.

LABEL: 0x6CF6
STRING: Hiragino clutched his head and leaned against the wall.

LABEL: 0x6DF3
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei, here.」

LABEL: 0x6E1A
STRING: Yukari handed him some xylitol tablets.

LABEL: 0x6E5E
STRING: The same ones he was constantly chewing.

LABEL: 0x6E90
STRING: Hiragino took them and immediately popped one into his mouth.

LABEL: 0x6EC8
STRING: 「Yukari-san, how did you...?」

LABEL: 0x6F03
STRING: 「They were left on the desk there, unopened.」

LABEL: 0x6F55
STRING: 「I don't carry these around with me if that's what you were thinking.」

LABEL: 0x7004
STRING: 「Don't lump me in with you.」

LABEL: 0x7098
STRING: Speaking rather quickly, Yukari turned her face away from him.

LABEL: 0x70D8
STRING: Her tone was harsh, but Hiragino didn't seem to mind at all. He took a deep breath with the tablets in hand.

LABEL: 0x715D
STRING: 「It would be a waste of time to wait for me to recover.」

LABEL: 0x71EA
STRING: 「Can I leave the search for Tokiwa to you, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x7224
STRING: 「――As soon as I'm feeling better, I'll come after you.」

LABEL: 0x7253
STRING: 「Yeah, got it.」

LABEL: 0x7273
STRING: 「Let's go, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0x7305
STRING: 「Right. Hiragino-sensei,

LABEL: 0x737A
STRING: don't push yourself too hard.」

LABEL: 0x739D
STRING: She spoke with worry in her voice.

LABEL: 0x73F9
STRING: He saw us off, and we left the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x74C0
STRING: But... this was bad.

LABEL: 0x74EA
STRING: I was still worried about Hiragino, but at least I knew where he was and that he was fully conscious.

LABEL: 0x753A
STRING: He also had his xylitol tablets with him, so he should recover in time.

LABEL: 0x758C
STRING: He should be able to provide a measure of resistance even now if someone were to come at him.

LABEL: 0x763D
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0x76B2
STRING: ――Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x76CC
STRING: I wanted to ask what the hell she was up to now, but this time it wasn't her fault.

LABEL: 0x7716
STRING: Hiragino said he was put to sleep by a sleeping agent.

LABEL: 0x7756
STRING: It was safe to assume that whoever did that and the culprit who attacked Tokiwa were the same person.

LABEL: 0x77AA
STRING: And considering that there was no one inside the rescue ship...

LABEL: 0x7869
STRING: I cast a sidelong glance at Yukari.

LABEL: 0x788D
STRING: There were deep wrinkles around her eyes as she held the makeshift pillowcase bag to her mouth.

LABEL: 0x78DF
STRING: I felt bad for her, but the rescue team and ROMLES were getting increasingly suspicious.

LABEL: 0x7929
STRING: Where did they take Tokiwa?

LABEL: 0x7961
STRING: Was there hope that she hadn't been killed yet? Or――

LABEL: 0x7A21
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x7A40
STRING: I turned around and met Yukari's eyes.

LABEL: 0x7A6A
STRING: My heart skipped a beat the moment my eyes met hers at the guilt of suspecting her colleagues.

LABEL: 0x7ABA
STRING: 「Wh-What is it?」

LABEL: 0x7AE7
STRING: 「It's important to find Tokiwa-san, of course, but we don't have any leads at the moment.」

LABEL: 0x7B4A
STRING: 「Well――」

LABEL: 0x7BD2
STRING: 「So, I'd like to discuss it. Why don't we go check on the sisters first?」

LABEL: 0x7C38
STRING: 「Putting Hiragino-sensei to sleep and taking Tokiwa-san away is way more forceful than I thought.」

LABEL: 0x7C96
STRING: 「It would be more efficient to get those two into a safer environment since we know where they are.」

LABEL: 0x7CF5
STRING: 「That makes sense...」

LABEL: 0x7D11
STRING: Touri and Reiri.

LABEL: 0x7D2B
STRING: We had left them asleep in the crew room, but they weren't the kind of people who could stand their ground under pressure.

LABEL: 0x7D93
STRING: With the two of them still asleep, they would be easily done in if they were to be harmed in any way.

LABEL: 0x7DF1
STRING: 「We can find out more about our culprit's attitude and movements if we go and check on the two of them.」

LABEL: 0x7E57
STRING: 「Let's head to the second floor.」

LABEL: 0x7F49
STRING: Our search continued with us running through the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x7F96
STRING: We hurried to Touri's and Reiri's room.

LABEL: 0x802D
STRING: As usual, the room was tidy.

LABEL: 0x8057
STRING: There was no trace of anyone entering――

LABEL: 0x8094
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x80B5
STRING: I turned around at Yukari's voice.

LABEL: 0x8132
STRING: She was pointing to the floor at her feet.

LABEL: 0x8164
STRING: And there...

LABEL: 0x817E
STRING: 「Footprints...」

LABEL: 0x81A7
STRING: 「That's right.」

LABEL: 0x81C1
STRING: 「The last time we were here, these weren't here...」

LABEL: 0x81F6
STRING: Did that mean someone had walked along the flooded hallway and entered this room?

LABEL: 0x8246
STRING: But in that case, why――

LABEL: 0x828C
STRING: ――I continued and looked at the bed.

LABEL: 0x82BA
STRING: 「Reiri...!」

LABEL: 0x82D6
STRING: She wasn't there.

LABEL: 0x82EC
STRING: Touri was sleeping in the same position as before.

LABEL: 0x8324
STRING: But Reiri, who should have been lying right next to her, was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x8362
STRING: The spot where she was sleeping had a mark on the futon in the shape of her body.

LABEL: 0x83A6
STRING: It spoke volumes about how she'd been there just a little while ago.

LABEL: 0x83F9
STRING: 「Where has Reiri-san gone...?」

LABEL: 0x8420
STRING: Yukari reacted a little later.

LABEL: 0x8444
STRING: There was a hint of fatigue in her voice.

LABEL: 0x84C9
STRING: I couldn't believe that not only Tokiwa, but now Reiri too, had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x8501
STRING: The rescue team was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x8521
STRING: The culprit, of course, was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0x85A8
STRING: The space available on this submarine was limited, even though it was equipped with state-of-the-art facilities for comfort.

LABEL: 0x860E
STRING: And inside here, on the <SHEEP III>, this many people had gone missing in quick succession...

LABEL: 0x865D
STRING: It wasn't possible.

LABEL: 0x8677
STRING: Something that should have been impossible was happening.

LABEL: 0x86A7
STRING: But, this was reality.

LABEL: 0x86C1
STRING: They say that something sleeps at the bottom of the deep sea, but I didn't find myself amused by that either.

LABEL: 0x8766
STRING: ――There was something here.

LABEL: 0x8784
STRING: Something I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x87AE
STRING: I thought it might be someone's curse or something, but...

LABEL: 0x87E2
STRING: Otherwise, this would be strange.

LABEL: 0x8818
STRING: It was weird...

LABEL: 0x8893
STRING: There had to be some deranged reason.

LABEL: 0x88B1
STRING: I didn't know what was right or wrong anymore.

LABEL: 0x88ED
STRING: Everything was suspicious.

LABEL: 0x890B
STRING: Everything was irritating.

LABEL: 0x892B
STRING: Why... Why was nothing going the way I wanted it to?

LABEL: 0x89C8
STRING: Reiri, too――

LABEL: 0x89E0
STRING: How many times had she disappeared now?

LABEL: 0x8A71
STRING: Not just her, but even Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x8AD5
STRING: The motionless

LABEL: 0x8BA9
STRING: Touri and Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x8BC3
STRING: Weren't we supposed to be saved?

LABEL: 0x8C31
STRING: The rescue ship came to our rescue,

LABEL: 0x8C4F
STRING: and we were finally going to get out of this damn submarine...

LABEL: 0x8C7F
STRING: That's how it was supposed to be――

LABEL: 0x8CF8
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x8D14
STRING: 「What's happening...?」

LABEL: 0x8DB4
STRING: 「I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x8DD7
STRING: 「Just what...」

LABEL: 0x8DF1
STRING: 「What the hell is this?」

LABEL: 0x8E28
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x8E4B
STRING: My voice trembled without me realizing it.

LABEL: 0x8E73
STRING: ...I couldn't help it.

LABEL: 0x8E99
STRING: What did this all mean?

LABEL: 0x8EBB
STRING: Why were we going through this?

LABEL: 0x8EF7
STRING: 「The rescue team did come here, right?」

LABEL: 0x8F91
STRING: 「...That's right.」

LABEL: 0x8FB8
STRING: 「Are you sure?」

LABEL: 0x903E
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x905B
STRING: She raised her voice, not understanding my question.

LABEL: 0x909C
STRING: 「You saw it too, right?」

LABEL: 0x90CC
STRING: 「Not just the rescue ship, there was the diving suit too.」

LABEL: 0x9113
STRING: 「――Are you sure that was the rescue team?」

LABEL: 0x91B1
STRING: 「...What do you mean by that?」

LABEL: 0x91DE
STRING: I understood what Yukari was trying to say.

LABEL: 0x9206
STRING: That was a rescue ship from ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x922A
STRING: And a ROMLES rescue team had come to save us.

LABEL: 0x9254
STRING: But... was that actually true?

LABEL: 0x927A
STRING: 「If they really wanted to rescue us, they should've met up with us long ago.」

LABEL: 0x92C4
STRING: 「You know that, don't you, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x9304
STRING: 「It wasn't the rescue team that came here, but someone else.」

LABEL: 0x93DD
STRING: Yukari fell silent.

LABEL: 0x93F5
STRING: While crossing her arms, what was she thinking about, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x942F
STRING: About the reason why the rescue team didn't show themselves?

LABEL: 0x9459
STRING: About the possibility of someone from the rescue team arriving on this ship?

LABEL: 0x948D
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x94A7
STRING: I didn't know, but――

LABEL: 0x94E3
STRING: ――At that time.

LABEL: 0x9671
STRING: 「The lights――」

LABEL: 0x968D
STRING: And then,

LABEL: 0x96A5
STRING: a flicker――

LABEL: 0x9894
STRING: 「...A blackout?」

LABEL: 0x98B4
STRING: ...Not again.

LABEL: 0x98CE
STRING: I'd get even more annoyed if this kept up.

LABEL: 0x9914
STRING: A pale orange light immediately flashed on.

LABEL: 0x9944
STRING: The interior of the ship was dimly illuminated by a faint light.

LABEL: 0x9980
STRING: Still, what a terrible timing.

LABEL: 0x99AE
STRING: Why now, in a situation like this...?

LABEL: 0x9A53
STRING: 「POL!」

LABEL: 0x9A6F
STRING: Yukari immediately called for POL.

LABEL: 0x9A92
STRING: She no longer seemed to be deep in thought at all.

LABEL: 0x9ACC
STRING: There was no response.

LABEL: 0x9AEF
STRING: I knew it... We could never seem to use it when it counted.

LABEL: 0x9B1F
STRING: I felt like I had just reevaluated it a moment ago, but this was why POL...

LABEL: 0x9B66
STRING: ――Suddenly, a doubt crossed my mind.

LABEL: 0x9B92
STRING: 「The power outage before was a prank by Reiri and Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x9C53
STRING: 「...No way, did they do it again?」

LABEL: 0x9D30
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0x9D48
STRING: No, no. Of course not.

LABEL: 0x9D82
STRING: Even they wouldn't ignore the unconscious Touri and Hiragino to do something like that...

LABEL: 0x9DDE
STRING: ...Right?

LABEL: 0x9E12
STRING: Maybe?

LABEL: 0x9E30
STRING: Tokiwa wouldn't be able to contain herself in this darkness.

LABEL: 0x9E7C
STRING: And Reiri wouldn't stop at just turning off the lights.

LABEL: 0x9EBC
STRING: 「――Wait, just how little trust do I have in them?」

LABEL: 0x9F82
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x9F98
STRING: Unlike the previous blackout, the emergency power supply activated this time.

LABEL: 0x9FDC
STRING: Which meant there was a good chance it wasn't artificial, but a real blackout...?

LABEL: 0xA0A9
STRING: 「Let's split up.」

LABEL: 0xA0D1
STRING: 「I'll search the wheelhouse, and you can search the first floor.」

LABEL: 0xA120
STRING: 「It's dangerous to split into two groups.」

LABEL: 0xA14A
STRING: 「Shouldn't we stick together?」

LABEL: 0xA1F7
STRING: 「...Don't treat me like a child.」

LABEL: 0xA220
STRING: For some reason, Yukari sulked.

LABEL: 0xA240
STRING: This wasn't the time for that, but...

LABEL: 0xA27C
STRING: 「They got soporific smoke with them.」

LABEL: 0xA2A6
STRING: 「And most likely, Tokiwa and Reiri are in their hands.」

LABEL: 0xA2E6
STRING: 「If something happens, we can't do anything by ourselves.」

LABEL: 0xA320
STRING: 「Weren't you there to save me when I lost consciousness just earlier?」

LABEL: 0xA3E7
STRING: 「...You're certainly right.」

LABEL: 0xA47B
STRING: 「Sorry... I seem to be losing my head a bit.」

LABEL: 0xA4B8
STRING: Yukari must have been feeling pretty weak to admit her own fault right away.

LABEL: 0xA502
STRING: Since Hiragino wasn't here yet, she must be under a lot of pressure as the only one in charge.

LABEL: 0xA56E
STRING: 「Should we head back to the wheelhouse for now?」

LABEL: 0xA625
STRING: 「No... Don't worry about me.」

LABEL: 0xA653
STRING: 「It's dim, but let's go down to the first floor.」

LABEL: 0xA68C
STRING: It didn't look like she was going to back down.

LABEL: 0xA6B2
STRING: There was no need to make her rest against her will.

LABEL: 0xA6F0
STRING: If we didn't find Tokiwa and Reiri soon...

LABEL: 0xA7A4
STRING: We descended the spiral staircase in the darkness.

LABEL: 0xA8F6
STRING: Yukari and I descended to the first floor.

LABEL: 0xA91C
STRING: The hallway was dimly lit.

LABEL: 0xA936
STRING: The water level down here was even higher than on the upper floors.

LABEL: 0xA988
STRING: 「Now, where should we start...」

LABEL: 0xA9C9
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0xA9E6
STRING: Yukari let out a strange voice.

LABEL: 0xAAB7
STRING: When I turned around, her eyes were open wide in agitation.

LABEL: 0xAB6C
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0xAB88
STRING: 「Look at the bridge!」

LABEL: 0xABB7
STRING: 「The bridge...?」

LABEL: 0xABF1
STRING: I followed her suggestion and faced the bridge.

LABEL: 0xAC30
STRING: 「The watertight door over there... Did we leave it open?」

LABEL: 0xAC7B
STRING: The door, which should have separated the front and rear sections, was now open, and seawater was flowing through to the bridge.

LABEL: 0xACF7
STRING: That door did seem to be closed the last time I saw it...

LABEL: 0xAD39
STRING: 「Any ideas, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0xADED
STRING: 「I wanted to ask you that.」

LABEL: 0xAE30
STRING: What was the meaning of this...?

LABEL: 0xAE52
STRING: Did someone open the door to the rear section...?

LABEL: 0xAE90
STRING: But if that was it, then who?

LABEL: 0xAED3
STRING: ――It all happened suddenly.

LABEL: 0xAFD7
STRING: 「Uwaaah...!!」

LABEL: 0xB0BA
STRING: A low cry could be heard in the distance.

LABEL: 0xB0E6
STRING: It was a man's voice.

LABEL: 0xB0FC
STRING: But it was not Hiragino's...

LABEL: 0xB122
STRING: Then whose was it?!

LABEL: 0xB1A4
STRING: 「Yukari-san――」

LABEL: 0xB23B
STRING: 「Let's go!」

LABEL: 0xB27A
STRING: She rushed ahead as soon as she said that.

LABEL: 0xB29C
STRING: As the water splashed beneath our feet, we headed in the direction of the shout.

LABEL: 0xB2DE
STRING: We ran down the dimly lit hallway.

LABEL: 0xB300
STRING: As I ran, I could feel myself getting excited.

LABEL: 0xB332
STRING: "Someone" was there.

LABEL: 0xB350
STRING: Someone we hadn't seen before.

LABEL: 0xB382
STRING: I couldn't even tell if they were an ally or an enemy.

LABEL: 0xB3BE
STRING: ...However, meeting them would definitely get us moving forward.

LABEL: 0xB400
STRING: There's got to be some kind of a lead...

LABEL: 0xB422
STRING: ――All of this would finally be over!!

LABEL: 0xB448
STRING: Unable to suppress my pounding heart, I was running out of breath.

LABEL: 0xB4DD
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xB595
STRING: What gradually came into view...

LABEL: 0xB65D
STRING: Was a human form

LABEL: 0xB670
STRING: emitting light.

LABEL: 0xB6EC
STRING: What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0xB70A
STRING: It was something in the shape of a human body, emitting light.

LABEL: 0xB736
STRING: The lights ranged from as dim as a firefly,

LABEL: 0xB764
STRING: to as vivid as a neon sign.

LABEL: 0xB79C
STRING: They were colors I'd never seen before.

LABEL: 0xB7BE
STRING: A luminescent pattern I'd never seen before.

LABEL: 0xB7E8
STRING: I had never seen light like this on the surface, let alone in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0xB820
STRING: ――Unknown colors.

LABEL: 0xB83E
STRING: That was the only way to describe it.

LABEL: 0xB866
STRING: A sinister yet divine light,

LABEL: 0xB886
STRING: that didn't resemble anything else.

LABEL: 0xB8AC
STRING: I could feel myself get captivated by the strange humanoid form.

LABEL: 0xB978
STRING: And, standing in front of it

LABEL: 0xB990
STRING: with their feet submerged in the water

LABEL: 0xB9B8
STRING: were Tokiwa and Reiri.

LABEL: 0xBAE9
STRING: The two of them stood still.

LABEL: 0xBB09
STRING: It was as if they were being bathed in the divine light before them.

LABEL: 0xBB45
STRING: The composition was complete, like a single painting.

LABEL: 0xBB75
STRING: Two unmoving people and a humanoid figure.

LABEL: 0xBB99
STRING: Neither Yukari nor I could say a word.

LABEL: 0xBBCB
STRING: Time had frozen.

LABEL: 0xBBE7
STRING: I had a feeling like this moment would last forever.

LABEL: 0xBCAF
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0xBCC5
STRING: It all happened in an instant.

LABEL: 0xBD8D
STRING: The light moved.

LABEL: 0xBDA9
STRING: The humanoid form crumbled.

LABEL: 0xBDC7
STRING: ――Yukari moved immediately.

LABEL: 0xBF13
STRING: 「――Run away!」

LABEL: 0xBF39
STRING: 「Hurry!」

LABEL: 0xBF58
STRING: She screamed.

LABEL: 0xBF6C
STRING: There was not a shred of her usual rationale left.

LABEL: 0xBFA4
STRING: Oozing out from the shadows, was light.

LABEL: 0xBFCE
STRING: It headed toward Reiri and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xBFFA
STRING: Yukari stood in its way as if trying to block it.

LABEL: 0xC02C
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0xC0D7
STRING: The oozing light bypassed her as if it had a will of its own.

LABEL: 0xC11D
STRING: The light continued straight toward Reiri, now free of any obstructions.

LABEL: 0xC2A5
STRING: The two of them stood still as it approached――

LABEL: 0xC2E9
STRING: ...I didn't like where this was going.

LABEL: 0xC31A
STRING: 「Run!」

LABEL: 0xC339
STRING: A desperate scream.

LABEL: 0xC35B
STRING: The tone of her voice was hopeless.

LABEL: 0xC4BF
STRING: 「Why aren't you two moving?!」

LABEL: 0xC4F2
STRING: 「――Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0xC533
STRING: ――I didn't need to be told.

LABEL: 0xC5C5
STRING: Without replying, I broke into a run.

LABEL: 0xC5FF
STRING: I had to save them.

LABEL: 0xC61B
STRING: I was the only one who could.

LABEL: 0xC78F
STRING: As quickly as I could,

LABEL: 0xC7A3
STRING: I

LABEL: 0xC7B9
STRING: ran up to them

LABEL: 0xC7D1
STRING: and reached out...

LABEL: 0xCA3A
STRING: ――And grabbed

LABEL: 0xCA53
STRING: Reiri's hand.

LABEL: 0xCC5A
STRING: ――And grabbed

LABEL: 0xCC75
